overview: In a mountainous but extremely green landscape, horses graze on the plain, goats jump over rocks, and laughing children run after them. In this paradise on earth, nomadic families have found their temporary home. From one of them comes a teenage girl, Shahnaz. The girl is distinguished by her intelligence and great passion for words. For some time now, she has even been making her first creative attempts, inspired by the reality around her. In this enchanting natural world, everyday life is immersed in tradition according to which adolescent daughters must get married. This is exactly what her father plans for her, and in the meantime Shahnaz’s thoughts are focused on the world of literature.
title: The Dream of a Horse
